job.title: Associate Veterinarian- Bay Cities Pet Hospital
job.description: pstrongBay Cities Pet Hospital strongis looking to add a great associate veterinarian to their amazing team of professionals We are a 3doctor small animal practice that specializes in providing high quality compassionate and convenient care for our patientsbrbrppstrongOur Facilitystrong Bay Cities Pet Hospital is an established modern and wellequipped veterinary hospital and boarding We have digital xray and digital dental xray modern ultrasounds and an inhouse labbrbrppstrongOur Package strongOur benefits package includes an employersponsored 401k match medical dental vision employersponsored health savings account HSA match flexible spending accounts employersponsored life insurance supplemental life and disability insurance legal amp identity theft plans paid time off paid parental leave subsidized back up care amp family care benefits veterinaryspecific employee assistance program fertilityadoptionsurrogacy support and discounts student loan education amp refinancing a very generous veterinary service discount for your pets as well as continuing education and an annual discretionary fundbrbrppstrongOur Homestrong Since 1958 Bay Cities Pet Hospital has provided quality animal care to the South Bay community Today we combine a legacy of experience with the latest technology in veterinary medicine to look after the fourfooted members of your family Bay Cities Pet Hospital operates an appointmentfree walkin fullservice veterinary hospital with convenient hours seven days a week At Bay Cities Pet Hospital we take pride in providing the best in modern veterinary medical services coupled with the kind of oldfashioned compassion that seems to be going out of style in our industry these days We conduct wellness exams for new puppies and kittens routine checkups for old family friends dental care bathing and vaccinations to keep your pets clean and healthy and diagnostic exams and surgeries in the unfortunate event that theyre notbrbrpp brbrppstrongJob RequirementsbrbrstrongpulliLoyal passionate about patient care and client communicationliliOffers excellent diagnostic abilities along with outstanding communicationliliDedicated and takes pride in your work values collaboration and is emotionally intelligentliliTruly values patient care and has a strong ambition to grow and is overall enthusiastic about veterinary medicinebrliulpstrongVIP Program strongVeterinary Incentive Planstrong brbrstrongppThe industryfirst program called the Veterinarian Incentive Plan allows current doctors and those who become a part of the Pathway team to elect to participate in the new bonus structure which is based on tenure and company performance General practice veterinarians can earn up to 225000 Onethird of the total VIP award is based on each doctors tenure and the other twothirds is based on company performancebrbrppThe program is eligible for current and new doctors who provide veterinary care at Pathway veterinary hospital locations and includes general practice specialty and emergency doctors This includes both parttime and fulltime doctorsbrbrAt strongemPathwayemstrong we celebrate and embrace the uniqueness and diversity of all of our team members pet parents and pets We strive to create a diverse equitable and inclusive culture where all team members belong and feel empoweredbrbrppApply today Come join our TEAM we look forward to hearing from youbrbrp  brbrPI144939995
